title:
The traffic lights around Wilmington used to blink late at night and early morning.  Why did they quit blinking?

It was a great idea that saved lots of energy.  It is very frustrating sitting at a red light at 4 AM for several minutes with no other cars within sight
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20091004/COLUMNIST/910039961
